# URLSessionWebSocketTask.Message.string(_:)

**Case**

A WebSocket message that contains a string.

## Declaration

```swift
case string(String)
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionWebSocketTask] uses UTF-8 encoding to send the message’s string.

## Message types

- **URLSessionWebSocketTask.Message.data(_:)**: A WebSocket message that contains a block of data.
